content:
:robot: :light_bulb: CLAIRE, D&M and CIIRC CTU are happy to share with you Czech version of 2. part of #brAInfood series with the topic of How to survive a conversation about Artificial Intelligence? brAInfood2_CZ.pdf
With brAInfood, the Knowledge Centre Data & Society wants to provide easily accessible information about artificial intelligence.
You can also visit a Knowledge Centre Data & Society website for the original document and other parts of this series: https://data-en-maatschappij.ai/en/publications/brainfood-2-hoe-overleef-je-een-gesprek-over-artifici%C3%ABle-intelligentie

brAInfood 2: How to survive a conversation about artificial intelligence?
Knowledge Centre Data & Society
